title: Honor 5 and 0 capsules
body: Hello summoners! I have one quick question. Do I need to do something to get honor capsules? cuz I recently hit honor5 and from honor 3 to 5 I didnt got single capsule. That looks weird >.<

replies.body: I have been honor 4 for quite a while and i have noticed this to my friends have gotten 3 to 5 honor capsules and i have gotten nothing this is not fair it should be a higher percentage for people to get it because it is possible for the percentage to glitch and people to never get it i have seen it in many games{{champion:222}}

Those capsules aren't necessarily a guaranteed drop at any certain level, and you may not see one if you've already reached your limit of key fragment drops. Once your available key fragments refresh you should have a better chance of seeing one of those capsules!
"If you're honorable and get lvl 3 you can get honor capsules!! yey!! But take notice that you may have the chance of never getting them!! yey!!"

Ahem, I never said that you have a chance of 'never' getting them. I said if you've already all of your key fragments you may need to wait for those to refresh as they do every roughly 28 days. You obviously have a better chance of getting a capsule if you have all of your key fragments available as opposed to only having 1 fragment available.
Think about "chance". Flipping the coin (50% chance) . Even if you have 50% probabilty, you may always do head and never get tails

This is... close enough to correct, if honor capsules are a pure random event. I doubt that Riot has set them up this way. I would guess that there's some sort of correction factor involved, where your chance of getting an honor capsule at any given opportunity increases if you haven't gotten one in a long time.
It would be nice if it's like that, which means there should be a time in which you have 100% of getting them, but they didn't mention anything about this

There's no reason to treat pure random chance as the default. My suggestion is consistent with how keys are dropped and similar practices elsewhere, both by Riot games and across the industry, which is why I think it's more likely.

Please read the Honor System page please ... jesus.
Honor rewards are only at the end of the season not when you get to a certain honor level.
Go there and read the page.
I never said anything about honor rewards. I was asking about capsules.
